main.description: Update policy settings for a conversation. Only admins can update policies. At least one policy field must be provided.

allowInvites.description: Whether invite links are enabled for this conversation

adminOnlyInvites.description: Whether only admins can create invite links

allowMemberAdd.description: Whether non-admin members can add other members

allowMemberRemove.description: Whether non-admin members can remove other members

requireAdminApproval.description: Whether new members require admin approval before joining

maxMembers.description: Maximum number of members allowed in this conversation

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.description: Caller is not an admin of this conversation

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: Caller is not a member of this conversation

errors.name: NoFieldsProvided
errors.description: At least one policy field must be provided

errors.name: InvalidMaxMembers
errors.description: maxMembers is less than current member count
